summary: 16-hour Flights Little drabble of what happened after their flight from Vancouver to Melbourne, which happened to be an...
body:
16-hour Flights

Little drabble of what happened after their flight from Vancouver to Melbourne, which happened to be an exhausting 16 hours!

—————

They rode up the lift in silence, Phil tapping vigorously on his phone while Dan had his back up against the wall opposite him. His eyes were heavy, and he could barely understand how Phil had any energy left to be able to keep typing away.

The lift dinged and Phil quickly walked off, his eyes not coming up from his phone, leaving Dan to trail the suitcases behind him. They walked in silence through a few hallways before Dan stopped in front of their room, pulling the keycard from their welcome bag and swiping it.

He pushed into the room first, taking their suitcases by the window so they were enough out of the way for them to get settled in. The door clicked behind Phil and buzzed to indicate it was locking. 

Dan sighed heavily and went to the loo before coming back out and beginning to peel off his clothes. He felt like they were clinging to every inch of his skin, it felt suffocating. 

Once he had tossed his shirt, socks, and trousers on top of their cases and was left in just his pants, he turned once again back to Phil, who hadn’t moved more than a few feet into the room and was now perched on the edge of the desk chair. 

“What the hell is so important that you haven’t looked up from your bloody phone in over 10 minutes?” 

Phil looked up, slightly startled. He blinked a few times like he was adjusting to real life, now that he was pulled away from his phone. “What?”

“Your phone. I want it.”

Phil slowly handed the phone over to Dan, who snatched it from his hands and walked across the room to put it into their carry-on bag. 

“What’s your issue?”

Dan rolled his eyes as he zipped the bag shut and turned back to face him. “We just got off a fucking 16 hour flight, Phil. I’m exhausted. We have barely 3 days to fix our jeglag before our next show, and there’s no possible way I can get any sleep with you clickity-clacking over here on your damn cell!”

Phil slowly stood up, taking a step closer to Dan, who was visibly shaking, whether from anger or exhaustion, Phil couldn’t tell. Phil gave him the softest smile he could and reached out to grab his hip, gently rubbing his thumb over the divots of his hip bone. “I’m sorry. I really am, love.”

Dan tried to take a deep breath, but the exhaustion finally won over his emotions and he fell into Phil’s arms, clinging to him as a few tears slipped out. 

“Let’s sleep, yeah? You go get comfy and I’ll wash up and join you.” He whispered into the soft lump of curls tucked into his neck. 

Dan gave a weak nod and pulled away, wiping away his tears and going to pull back the heavy hotel duvet and climbing into bed. Phil went into the washroom and returned a few minutes later in just his pants. He slid into bed next to Dan and set his glasses on the nightstand before flicking off the lamp.

“Get some good shut-eye. When we get up, we’ll order room service and then I’m taking you to the beach.”

Dan snuggled into his chest and wrapped his arms around his middle, breathing him in deeply. Neither of them smelt great, but they did the best they could considering the length of their trip. “Will it be warm and lovely?” He asked into the darkness. 

“Of course, an Australian beach is bound to be lovely.” 

———————

Like/reblogs are appreciated <3

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

body:
Guys

Are we gonna have the “use your brain” conversation again?


I see everyone “speculating” that Dan and Phil are posting their insta stories long after they’ve actually happened. And like???? Yeah??? Of course they are???


They probably want to avoid as many random fan encounters as possible, and wouldn’t want people knowing right where they are and mobbing or being stalkers. So like, it makes complete sense for them to wait until they’re off the plane to post insta stories from the plane. It makes total sense for them to wait until they’re off the beach to post insta stories from the beach. Those boys aren’t stupid. I would assume that every single insta story we’ve ever seen has been posted sometime after it was actually taken.

tags: aristotle and dante discover the secrets of the universe
title: What is this
body:
Hey to absolutely nobody! These are some of my obsessions/interests so you know what you might see here!

  • Dan and Phil
    • Currently super obsessed with these cinnamon rolls
  • FEMINISM
    • Because if you’re not a feminist, you’re wrong
  • Percy Jackson
  • Harry Potter
  • Nerdfighter!!
    • John Green and Hank Green
  • Carry On
    • Fangirl too
  • I’ll give you the Sun
  • Ari and Dante discover the secrets of the universe
  • Gymnastics and the Gymternet
    • I do gymnastics but I’m a pretty low level
    • all these Instagram accounts are so amazing
  • Tom Daley
    • He and Lance are sooo cuute!
  • Cheerleading
    • It’s a sport. Fight me
  • Funny stuff! That isn’t offensive!
  • Photography is cool too

I might add to this list, and feel free to recommend things to me! You’re important.

tags: also pls appreciate the translators one minute of a video legit takes 10-30 minutes to translate
summary: So I decided that I’ll start translating D&P’s last year’s Gamingmas, since it takes some time to translate + it has to be...
body:
So I decided that I’ll start translating D&P’s last year’s Gamingmas, since it takes some time to translate + it has to be approved by YouTube, which also takes about a month and I want my fellow Czechs to have the translation until Christmas and I noticed one little, silly, stupid but funny thing.  This is how it looks like when you translate, right?

And there’s this bar where you can manage the timing of the subtitles. You can also see how loudly they’re talking. Which is like, cool, it can tell you when exactly someone starts talking, helpful!

You don’t usually pay much attention to it, especially when the timing of the subtitles is pre-set and D&P are just like, admiring the lynx and the graphics or whatever…

BUT THEN DAN SEES A WOLF

summary: for spooky week i think that dnp should play Until Dawn because the story is very interesting, i want to see the horrible...
question: for spooky week i think that dnp should play Until Dawn because the story is very interesting, i want to see the horrible decisions they make, Quick Time Events™️, and jump scares that will make dan scream
answer:
ooo yeah i talked abt this here (x) but i could see that being like…..friday the 13th esque? i’m always here for them trying to make decisions though, and i am down for anything that makes dan scream idk what it is abt him screaming it’s just really fuckin hilarious
